title: Instapot Baked Potatoes
description: Quick and easy baked potatoes in an Instant Pot.
instructions: Clean potatoes. Pierce with a fork. Add 3 cups of water to Instapot with silicone steamer basket in place. Place potatoes in pot. Close pressure valve. Pressure cook on high for 12 minutes. Let sit so pressure releases naturally for 20 minutes. Release any remaining pressure.
